title: client very slow, connecting problem, FPS probem
body:
Hi all, 
I have these three problems right now. i don't know why. Before i updated to the new version, everything was going fine. but after i updated to new version, I found out that the client goes very slow, and when i go to normal game, the game will freeze that looks like stop between client to the loading screen. After that, even though i can login game, but the FPS will drop hardly when i face to other champions. I used GTX1070, and i just confused why and how?
i have already re-install the windows, but it's still not working.

Help me out guys!

Thank you!

replies.body: You might also be experiencing problems with outdated drivers or game file issues that can cause sudden fps drops.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot this for a fix.  Hopefully, that will get your game running smoothly.

Do you have Windows 10, and have recently updated it?  These issues sounds like a common symptom that's been caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was auto-enabled in an update.  If this is the case for you, disable it for the fix.  Let me know if that helps!

yeah, it helps a lot. But the FPS is still dropping. It's kind like random drop. For example, I set the FPS is 80. It's fine when the game starts. However, when i face to champions, and doing cs, the FPS will drop randomly. I am confused how can i fix this bug? i was fine before 6.20.

thanks
